snippet.title: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This is my Indiegame ''Once Upon a Rogue's Tale''! A roguelike deckbuilder inspired by classic fairytales!

Once Upon a Rogue's Tale

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602540/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PolyPiratesGame
Website: https://polypirates.com/
Email: contact@polypirates.com

Music
----------------------------------------
Felix Bachlinger
